commentBody: None of the renaming teams are "my" team, but it was a no-brainer as to who I would root for in a match up of the class act that is Manning vs the no class Rothlisberger. Glad to see that at least in this instance, the nice guy did indeed win. Hopefully that pattern continues in the Super Bowl. I would love to see Peyton get another ring. If that can't happen, then go Arizona so that Larry can get one.
